overview:
Mr. Qin graduated from Kansas State University (Emporia) in 1991 with a Master Degree in Marketing. For the six (6) year period prior to founding EFT, Mr. Qin was a Corporate Director and Owner of a successful Import/Export company. During this period, Mr. Qinâ€™s company was responsible for the very successful North America introduction of the theft deterrent device â€œTheClub.â€

In 1998, after creating, building and fostering various successful network marketing companies, Mr. Qin founded EFT Holdings, Inc. which he has built into a multi-million dollar publicly traded company. Mr. Qin has served as the Companyâ€™s CEO, President and Chairman of the Board since its inception. Mr. Qin has led the expansion and growth of Digital Development Partners, Inc. since taking control of the company in March 2010. Mr. Qinâ€™s vision is to build a mobile enterprise software applications company that specializes in personalized and innovated go-to- market strategies that can easily be integrated into multiple direct sales and multi-level-marketing companies. Over the past 10 years, Mr. Qin has been honored with multiple awards including World Outstanding Chinese Businessman, Top 100 Outstanding Chinese Entrepreneurs, and 2006 Direct Marketing Industryâ€™s Top Ten model of corporate marketing innovation. Mr. Qin has also graced the cover of many magazines including China Style, Foreign Brand China and China Economic Development Forum.
